overview:
Currently based in London, UK, Emil creates and innovates for niche travel specialist Travelr Experience, setting up sites such as WineTravelr.com (and others coming soon) to help normal people understand how much freedom and information they can get by looking online, while in the end saving time and money from not having to place calls to personal travel agents…

Emil has a wide knowledge of IT both for online and desktop use. Furthermore, he is educated in areas such as Usability, Accessibility and has in depth knowledge on affiliate marketing, viral marketing while keeping constantly updated on new technologies and trends through several sources.

Projects from resent years for Mr Hunefalk include creating a vertical search engine for hotels across 40+ sites, at a point making it the fastest and broadest search in the world. The process included responsibility for back-end and front-end development, finding and evaluating hotel sites for new partnerships and keeping relations with partners in the UK.

Parallel to the hotel search engine, a car rental search engine was created. Although getting raving reviews from some sources, this didn’t however have the revolutionizing impact on the online car rental booking industry which could have been possible if more work had been done - and it is rumored that he involved in creating a site which could bring greater change to make it easier for travelers in search for transport….

relationships.title: Affiliate Tech Contact & IT Systems Engineer
